reviews.review_msg: Lovely person and sweet guy. He loves to help students and shows passion and excitement. I am so glad he is a member of this department, and would recommend him to anyone. Great course :)

Wonderful speaker. Usually lecture heavy but promotes discussion and questions. Expects some level of participation, usually in the form of reading responses. Lots of fun, engaged, and treats students with care and respect. 10/10.

Great lecturer, good at prompting discussion when needed but explains things thoroughly so that the lectures, coupled with the readings, are informative enough to get you through. She's very nice! Listening to her lecture is a pleasure because she speaks w/ the poetic cadence of a Newfoundlander that keeps you interested in even the dullest topic.

Biggest sweetheart in the world. Cares about every student, cares about the content ... just cares. Very understanding. Adds humour to lectures to keep the class paying attention. Ensnaring teaching style. Reading load more than reasonable for an upper level class. I'd take another class with this woman in a heartbeat.
